name: Mall Rats 2023
description:
Description: 

Play as a robotic vacuum cleaner in a retro-futuristic abandoned mall, trying to clean up trash that long-gone patrons left behind. But beware! Fierce robotic rats, having made the mall their nest, roam the shelves in hordes (it is NYC, after all). Can you clean up the entire mall while enduring all that the Big Apple can throw at you?

Controls:

Move around by 'slingshotting' yourself around the level with the cursor and exterminate the rats by ramming into them with your bumper!
Note that vacuuming up trash heals you and that you can block damage with the bumper.

 Keyboard & Mouse: Aiming: Mouse

Sling-shotting: Left Click and Drag then Release Left Click

Brake: Space

Pause: P


Credits:
Lead Programmer: Blake R
Programmer: Kaelin WH
Artist/Sound Designer: Eve F
Artist: Kai K
Producer: Hayden P
